Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Indiana. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Indiana.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
